phases.name: Phase 1: Structural Integrity
phases.description: Building the chassis. Focus on tendon strength and back safety. Deload on week 4 and week 8: reduce sets by 1 and weight by 20%.

exercises.name: Warmup: Band Pull-Aparts
exercises.note: Light band. Squeeze shoulder blades together at end range.

exercises.name: Warmup: Hip Circles
exercises.note: Controlled circles, both directions. Open up the hip capsule.

exercises.name: Swedish Ladder Dead Hang
exercises.note: Engage scaps, do not just hang loose.

exercises.name: KB Gorilla Rows
exercises.note: Keep lower back flat. Use the 10lb DB if KB is too heavy initially.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.note: Hinge only. Squeeze glutes at top. No lower back rounding.

exercises.name: TRX Inverted Rows
exercises.note: Adjust strap length to change difficulty. Stop 1-2 reps before form breaks down.

exercises.name: Warmup: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.note: Lunge, rotate, reach. Opens hips, T-spine, and shoulders in one flow.

exercises.name: Hanging Knee Raises
exercises.note: Back against the ladder. Don't swing.

exercises.name: Peloton HIIT Tabata
exercises.note: Select a 'Tabata' or 'HIIT' class from the library.

exercises.name: 90/90 Hip Switch
exercises.note: Loosen up the hips for squats.

exercises.name: Thread the Needle
exercises.note: Thoracic rotation. Reach through, then open to ceiling. Keep hips stacked.

exercises.name: Wall Slides
exercises.note: Keep lower back and wrists flat against wall. Targets shoulder mobility and scapular control.

exercises.name: Peloton Power Zone Endurance
exercises.note: Zone 2/3 focus. Sweat but able to talk.
